channel.title: sms on XenoBlog
channel.description: Recent content in sms on XenoBlog

item.title: Send SMS through bibob with Powershell
item.description: I thought I had posted this script more than a year ago, but apparently I have not. It is quite similar to the script, I posted recently sending SMS messages through unwire, this just allows bibob customers to send messages through bibobs online gateway.

item.title: Send SMS from Powershell through Unwire
item.description: At work we have bought an SMS gateway service through the danish company Unwire, so after we the deal was signed we got the information on how to send email through their services, so in order to test I wrote a quick Powershell script to test it.
